content: original japanese name ねずみちゃん nezumi-chan direct link to pattern pdf 1 or from the pattern page click on the pdf icon underneath the photo of the mouse pattern is entirely in japanese but charted no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 8/0 5 0mm hook you will need approximately 20g 30 meters of color a and 5g 7 5 meters of color b 1 http //www clover co jp/cgi-bin/link_cnt/link_cnt cgi cnt=371
